title: Queenspot
subtitle: Salon Appointment Booking App, Beauty Parlor App, Makeup Booking App
resume: Queenspot is a beautician appointment booking app. Users can use it as a beauty parlor app, beautician app, multi salon finder app, etc. Looking for an online home salon and spa booking app then Queenspot will be a perfect choice. We develop salon appointment booking apps like beauty salon app, & barber app.

app.info: User app helps the user to book an appointment.

app.info: Admin panel exists in order to give you control over your app.
